articles.title: In first competition after four years, Anjali wins 400m gold in stunning race - The Indian Express
articles.description: Coming back after a long injury layoff, the 24-year-old Anjali, who last ran a 400m race in October 2019 at the Indian Open Championships in Ranchi, clocked 51.48
articles.content: Haryana’s Anjali Devi ran a stunning personal best time in her first competition in four years to win the women’s 400m gold and secure a place in the Asian Games on the second day of the National Int… [+5488 chars]

articles.author: Ryan O'Hanlon
articles.title: Kylian Mbappe copying LeBron James in contract negotiations - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Mbappe's future is going to be the story of the summer. He had two options: activate his extra option year or renegotiate a new deal with a ton of leverage. Wouldn't you do the same thing? After all, NBA stars have been doing it for years.
articles.content: On Tuesday, PSG's Kylian Mbappe confirmed to the AFP that he won't be activating the third-year option on his current contract. Essentially, he'll be a free agent next summer ... just like he was las… [+12074 chars]
